# Safety Tips for Riding E-Scooters

## Introduction
- Brief overview of the rising popularity of e-scooters
- Importance of following safety guidelines to prevent accidents and injuries

## Proper Gear
- Importance of wearing a helmet and other protective gear
- Recommendations for appropriate footwear and clothing

## Pre-Ride Checklist
- Checking the e-scooter for any damages or malfunctions
- Ensuring the battery is fully charged before starting the ride

## Riding Techniques
- Proper posture and balance while riding
- Understanding speed limits and traffic rules

## Awareness of Surroundings
- Keeping a safe distance from pedestrians and other vehicles
- Being mindful of obstacles and road conditions

## Parking and Storage
- Properly parking e-scooters in designated areas
- Safely storing e-scooters when not in use

## Emergency Preparedness
- Knowing how to safely dismount in case of emergencies
- Carrying a phone for communication in case of accidents

## Conclusion
- Recap of essential safety tips for riding e-scooters
- Encouragement to prioritize safety while enjoying the convenience of e-scooters
